name: Getaway Town
description:
This is a room escape game that can be played by multiple players on the same screen. Players need to find and move to a safe area before the end of the time, in order to go to a deeper area to rescue more beautiful girls trapped in the maze.
It supports up to two people to play on the same screen. Through the AD and left and right direction keys on the keyboard, you can control the movement of the character and avoid the deadly organs in the secret room.
